HostMantis offers reliable hosting at affordable prices!

Available locations include: Canada, New York, UK, Singapore, Germany, Australia and now France!

Now offering UNLIMITED bandwidth on all shared hosting plans!

FREE DDoS protection is included with your web hosting plan!

We also offer FREE SSL certificates with Let’s Encrypt!!!

HostMantis offers proven, reliable web hosting at an unbeatable price.


Tired of overloaded, slow servers, constant downtime and high cost?


Do you need an affordable alternative to a VPS or dedicated server?


Try any of our low cost shared hosting plans risk-free for 30 days with our money back guarantee!


Our current special for members is:


70% off our Entry, Starter, Advanced and Expert hosting plans for the life of your account!
